\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{X \otimes \prod _{\lambda \in \Lambda}K_\lambda} && {\prod _{\lambda \in\Lambda}X \otimes K_\lambda} \\
	{Y \otimes \prod _{\lambda \in \Lambda}K_\lambda} && {\prod _{\lambda \in\Lambda}Y \otimes K_\lambda} \\
	{M \otimes \prod _{\lambda \in \Lambda}K_\lambda} && {\prod _{\lambda \in \Lambda} M \otimes  K_\lambda}
	\arrow["\simeq", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{g \otimes 1}", from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{f\otimes 1}"', shift right=5, curve={height=18pt}, from=1-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\prod (g \otimes 1)}"', from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\prod (f \otimes 1)}", shift left=5, curve={height=-18pt}, from=1-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["\simeq", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{h\otimes 1}", from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\prod (h \otimes 1)}"', from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=3-1, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
